source.name: OpenAI GPT-3 models
source.instructions: **Fill in the blank with the right model.**
source.text:
- <<<davinci>>> is the most capable GPT-3 model. 
- <<<ada>>> is the fastest and lowest cost model
- <<<davinci>>> uses the most recent set of data for training
source.guidance: The `davinci` model is the most capable and has the most recent training data. The `ada` model is the fastest and lowest cost model of the four.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT differentiate the different GPT-3 models
